system.description:
Until the end of your next turn, you have advantage on saving throws to resist falling prone or being moved against your will, and other creatures have disadvantage on saving throws made to move through your space. 

In addition, until the start of your next turn, your reach extends by 10 feet for the purposes of enemy creatures triggering opportunity attacks, and creatures provoke attacks of opportunity when they enter your threatened area. If you make an opportunity attack against a creature beyond your weapon’s normal reach, you may move up to 10 feet as part of your reaction to bring the creature within your weapon’s range. On a hit, the creature’s movement speed is reduced to 0.
